# Goal

- Merge updated motif data into pre-existing dataset.
- Updated 2025-03-12 to use merged file of corrections from 02-16 and 03-11


# Set up

## Load libraries

```{r}


## load libraries
library(stats)
require(MASS) # provides negative binomial fitting:  glm.nb
library(tidyverse)

```
## Local Functions

```{r}

```


## Load Data

```{r}

git_root <- system("git rev-parse --show-toplevel", intern=TRUE)
output_dir <- "output"
data_flawed <- read.csv(file.path(git_root, "data", "song", "motifs", "song.by.motif.data_2024-12-27.csv"))
# data_fixes <- read.csv(file.path(git_root, "data", "song", "motifs", "Tara.Empsome_2025-02-16_fixed.motif.data.csv"))
# Update file used
data_fixes <- read.csv(file.path(git_root, "data", "song", "motifs", "Tara.Empsome_2025-02-16.and.03-11_combined.csv"))

clipped_file_name_fix <- data_fixes$Clipped.File.Name

data_flawed |>
    filter( !(Clipped.File.Name %in% clipped_file_name_fix)) -> data_tmp

data <- bind_rows(data_fixes, data_tmp)

write_csv(data, file = file.path(git_root, "data", "song", "motifs", "motif.data_2025-03-03.csv"),
          quote="needed"
)

```
